control.name: Implement a monitoring tool
control.desc:
Make sure that all access to personal data is logged.

Implement a monitoring tool (e.g. SIEM) in order to automatically notify potential data breaches and/or implement process so that employees and data subjects (persons of whom personal data is processed) can manually report potential breaches.

test.steps:
1. Test accessing user personal data as legitimate users, employees, administrators and malicious actors.
  2. Verify all the above activities are successfully logged.
  3. Verify "suspicious" activity generated by mimicking an malicious actor is detected and relevant security personnel alerted by security monitoring tools.
  4. Verify employees and users have a mechanism whereby they can manually report known, potential, or suspected data breaches.
